Title: Multi-modal Pathological Pre-training via Masked Autoencoders for Breast Cancer Diagnosis
Authors: Mengkang Lu, Tianyi Wang, Yong Xia
Image type: pathology, H&E whole slide images, matched IHC WSIs
Subgroups: breast cancer, women, malignant tumors
Info of datasets:
Dataset 1: AutomatiC Registration Of Breast cAncer Tissue (ACROBAT) Challenge provides H&E WSIs and matched IHC WSIs (ER, PR, HER2, and KI67), which consists of 750 training cases, 100 validation cases, and 300 testing cases. 
Dataset 2: Breast Cancer Immunohistochemical Image Generation Challenge  consists of 3896 pairs of images for training and 977 pairs for testing, which are used to generate HER2 images based on H&E images.
Dataset 3: HER2 On H&E (HEROHE) Challenge is developed to predict the HER2 status in invasive BC cases via the analysis of HE slides. It contains 359 training samples and 150 test samples for WSI classification.

Title: Multi-scope Analysis Driven Hierarchical Graph Transformer for Whole Slide Image Based Cancer Survival Prediction

Subgroups: patients, colorectal cancer, liver hepatocellular carcinoma, kidney clear cell carcinoma, high risk patients, low risk patients,
Info of datasets:
Dataset 1: Colorectal Cancer (CRC)(385 cases) cohort collected from co-operated hospital.
Dataset 2 and 3:  two public cancer cohorts from TCGA project, i.e., Liver Hepatocellular Carcinoma (LIHC)(371 cases) and Kidney Clear Cell Carcinoma (KIRC)(398 cases) are also included as the censorship of these two data sets are relatively balanced.
